data.text: @TanyaFusco My daughter and her entire family came down with it her,her husband and 5 kidsall got it.
@TanyaFusco Congratulations to your daughter. Also hope that symptoms are mild and that sheâ€™s better soon!

@TanyaFusco I feel your pain. Our daughter tested positive last month (she lives in Ireland). Being away for this kind of news is the hardest part of parenting. Our daughter came through with no issues - mild symptoms due to her triple vax status. Hoping for the same result for you!
@TanyaFusco Oh my , hope she recovers quickly . My nephew in Ottawa has Covid with mild symptoms as well . Lucky they were vaccinated.
